original_text: And he sent Judah before him unto Joseph, to direct his face unto Goshen; and they came into the land of Goshen.
korean_text: 야곱이 유다를 요셉에게 미리 보내어 자기를 고센으로 인도하게 하고 다 고센 땅에 이르니

sentences.original_text: And he sent Judah before him
to direct his face unto Goshen
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 얼굴을 고센으로 향하게 하기 위해

sentences.original_text: and they came into the land of Goshen
